name: Fattoria San Martino

reviews.text: We chose to stop over at Montepulciano for 1 night on our way from central Tuscany to Rome.
reviews.title: Cozy Little House with Gorgeous View of Montepulciano

description: In the Beautiful Tuscan countryside, in Siena province, 800 meters far from Montepulciano's old town walls, San Martino organic farm carries on its biodynamic/homeopathic agriculture (inspired by the founder of Anthroposophy Dott. Rudolf Steiner) activities together with its farmhouse Bed and Breakfast service. San Martino's Farm and Villa are placed in a privileged location for its landscape that embraces the whole valley, the surrounding hills and a breathtaking view of the town. The Villa blends completely with the environment that surrounds it thanks to the colors of the external plaster obtained with local earth mixed with natural lime. The Villa has been recently restored according to the rules of bio architecture, using exclusively natural and ecological materials. Four spacious rooms, with mahogany wood floor and private bathrooms, are located on the first and second floor of the Villa
